name: Gutrot Potion
description: This unpalatable potion will force you to make a crucial choice between drinking it to save your life in agony, or dying but suffering less.

name: Superior Chest
description: This chest is enormous, but not enormous enough to file away all the archives on your superiority complex.

name: Kongoku’s Chest
description: The excess energy released by Kongoku made this chest appear.

name: Mayhav the Bloodthirsty's Chest
description: Who knows what's inside? Whale organs, or items stolen from sailors?

name: Puffed Frosteez Bread
description: This bread is the staple food of Frigostian aristocrats, which explains why their first bowel movement of the day comes earlier than that of their less aristocratic peers.

name: Icefish Fricassee
description: Once you taste it, you won't be able to do without it.

name: Lost Towel
description: The crafters don't yet know enough about this item for its characteristics to be revealed to potential buyers.

name: Gein's Chest
description: It's hard to know if this is really Gein's chest. Maybe it's Gein's Double's chest's double.

name: Fortified Smoked Sausage
description: It’s mainly due to the extreme elasticity of this shape-memory sausage that adults get told off for playing with their food.

name: Atcham's Chest
description: This chest holds the loot from a thousand misdeeds.

name: Bottle of Cocalane
description: The crafters don't yet know enough about this item for its characteristics to be revealed to potential buyers.

name: Magistral Box of Fragments
description: This box contains one or several map fragments. If you don't know how to read a map, you can resell them to adventurers who are a bit more clever.

name: Aspen Log
description: Unlike your sweetheart, this log is both sweet smelling and sweet tasting. Too bad it won't be more than a single mouthful.

name: Starry Potion
description: Use this potion to travel to the stars without leaving your house. Certain gullible Frigostians even claim that it brings good luck.

name: Stewed Frozen Icefish
description: They say that eating Frozen Icefish makes you smarter. Yet another story told to young Sadidas to make them eat Icefish.

name: Smoked Sausage
description: Although this is less popular than the ever sought-after sausage sorbet, smoked sausage is still appreciated for the unique taste of the final mouthful.

name: Frosteez Bread
description: This bread is the staple food of Frigostians, which explains why they've withstood the famine for nearly a century.

name: Frozen Icefish Fricassee
description: They say that eating Frozen Icefish makes you smarter. Yet another story told to young Iops to make them eat.

name: Scampihorse's Chest
description: This chest contains the treasures of all the pirates who took their loot with them to their watery graves.

name: Voldelor’s Chest
description: This chest holds all of Enurado’s missing gold.

name: Uchronic Elixir
description: There's no guarantee what effect ingesting this elixir will have on the creatures in a temporal anomaly.

description: Danioul Garnioul the Baker, a jealous rival of Xavier the Baker, came up with this recipe. Since his customers were always making fun of his ridiculous name, he avenged himself by kneading his dough with his bare feet. It's said his sales went through the roof.

name: Intre Bread
description: This bread is highly prized by the Iop community for its ability to fill warriors with overwhelming courage. The numerous deaths caused by its consumption are proof that it works. Xavier the Baker stopped making it when a company of limp-wristed troubadours terrorised the region for an entire winter.

name: Fortifying Black Pudding
description: Apparently black pudding is stronger than white pudding, but it’s impossible to say for sure, as nobody’s ever seen them arm-wrestle.

name: Sparkling Chest
description: If you hit two sparkling chests together hard enough, you just might produce some sparks and start a fire to burn their disappointing contents and quell your rage.

name: Burnet
description: The Bearman himself perfected the recipe of this bread, inspired by a particularly bad bout of indigestion.

name: Monkfish Salad

description: This drinking trough is a refreshing spot, a mount's paradise, it can either quench its thirst or have a quick dip if the season is hot. Filled with water and a few drops of magic potion, it will help your special friend grow big and strong.

name: Sparkling Box of Fragments
description: This box contains one or several map fragments. If you don't know how to read a map, you can resell them to adventurers who are a bit more clever.

name: Elm Manger
description: This manger is the perfect gift for your trusty mount, if you can find a happy balance between starving and overfeeding it. Take your mount to the manger when it begins to grow weak and it will take care of the rest.

name: Elm Slapper
description: This mechanical conception is designed to slap your mount across the face when it disobeys you. It used to be used in schools to teach young Iops to count to 5.

name: Elm Lightning Thrower
description: This terrifying wooden machine will launch a little lightning bolt at any creatures that get too close – which is the basis for the third most popular form of entertainment in the region. This machine is also great for increasing your mount's stamina – just tie it to its tail, sit back and enjoy the show!

name: Bulbish Potion
description: This potion has been made from extracts of bulbs that soaked in Kloug mash. The most audacious alchemists use rice flour instead of Kloug mash, which can no longer be found. Even though it might seem impossible, you'll get used to its taste.

name: Goku Potion
description: This potion won't make you a super warrior. Reported side-effects include: hairy tails, primate transformation.

description: This bread is one of the trickiest to make... It's extremely difficult to remain coherent as the fumes make their inebriating way into your bloodstream and your loaves slowly begin to scream terrifyingly cruel obscenities at you.

name: Raid Mption Potion
description: For the dead who aren't quite dead, and still have a lot to make up for.

name: Panthyrozy's Chest
description: This perfumed chest won't leave you cold.

name: Sweet n’ Sour Marinade
description: This dish is highly prized by adventurers who haven’t got time to waste on cooking a separate starter, main course and dessert.

name: Fortifying Sweet n’ Sour Marinade
description: This all-in-one dish is holding its own in the stakes against energy bars.

name: Ray Wing
description: When cooked too quickly in black Bwork butter, this wing releases an eye-watering flavour into the chewing mouth of the muncher. This meal is not a memorable one.

name: Farle's Ray Wing
description: When cooked with care in black Bwork butter, this Farle's Ray Wing releases an incredible flavour into the chewing mouth of the muncher. This meal will truly give you wings.

name: Hazel Log
description: Unlike your sweetheart, this log is both sweet smelling and sweet tasting. Too bad it won't be more than a single mouthful.

description: This fish swam a long way, and spawned many young in the rivers of Amakna. It's now ready to be eaten, and tastes delicious.

description: An alchemist wanted to reproduce Trools' ability to regenerate. Since taking blood from the source seemed to miss the point, the alchemist decided to synthesize it instead.

name: Faluche
description: Trools have a tendency to confuse this bread with a hat. No one's quite certain why.

name: Brakmarian Grillade
description: The Brakmarians have adapted their cooking to fit their environment, which explains the local custom of grilling just about anything, such as roadkill, long-lost relatives, you name it.

name: Fortifying Brakmarian Grillade
description: This grillade is difficult to perfect because not every prisoner reacts in the same way to the lava bath.

name: Sautéed Perch
description: This fish swam a long way, but failed to make it to the spawning grounds. Still, it's ready to be eaten, even if it is a little bland.

name: Heavy Chest
description: You'll be light-headed with joy when you reveal the contents of this heavy chest.

name: Mastigator's Chest
description: This chest was hermetically sealed to be resistant to your Corcodyl tears.

name: Tri Potion
description: Pandawas look down on the exportation of this non-alcoholic potion.

description: Only women are permitted to cook this dish, which has obviously set the anti-sexist organisations by the ears.

name: Unikron Blood
description: This potion faithfully reproduces all the properties of Unikron blood, except immortality. Drink it and you'll be cured!

name: Filtounga Dish
description: Filtounga is a unique dish. Its perfect melange of ingredients lends it a heavenly taste. Serve warm with a dash of cream and a sprig of fresh parsley.

description: Following the example set by the Royal Tofu, certain Pingwins grow a vibrating feather that is chock-full of magic. As for its usefulness...

description: Have a break in the bosom of nature. Take your Snack Whistle out and your mount will arrive quicker than a Wabbit chasing a Cawwot.

description: Despite repulsing more than a few vegetarians, this strawberry jelly treat is still an Amaknian favourite.

name: Greenjely

name: Virgin Scroll
description: This Scroll enables you to "mark" a target so that you can hunt it down.

name: Dantegoulish Potion
description: This magic potion is the only one that can cast magic into the lattice-work leather panties of Captain Chafer…It speaks volumes about the power of such a potion.

name: Fried Breaded Fish
description: This tasty stick is made from fat-free pieces of cubic fish. Its taste delights children but it has low nutritional value.

name: Fried Igloo Fish
description: This incredibly tasty stick is made from the best fat-free pieces of cubic fish. Its taste delights children and it has excellent nutritional value.

name: Undertaker Potion
description: When leaving your enemy as quiet as the grave isn't enough for you, use this potion to send his soul straight to the cemetery without passing go.

name: White Bread
description: The minstrel Davyd created this bread for people who, like him, don't mince words.

name: Sufokian Salad
description: When the fishing’s bad, Sufokians fall back on this salad, which contains all the protein they need. Just don’t ask where all the protein in this salad comes from.

name: Apewicube
description: There's something trapped in this cube of ice cut from Frigost's Frozen Lake. You've got two options if you want to find out what it is: wait until the ice melts, or, like any self-respecting brat, hit it until it shatters.

name: Sentinel Potion
description: The crafters don't yet know enough about this item for its characteristics to be revealed to potential buyers.

name: Ghetto Raid Potion
description: This potion lets you recover energy points.

name: Golden Larva Egg
description: As strange as it may seem, these Golden Larva Eggs are not laid by Golden Larvae but by more common sorts – green, orange or even blue. Nature is just full of disappointing surprises.

name: Healer Potion
description: You were supposed to protect that young, impressionable adventurer, but you failed miserably. Heigh-ho, you can always use this potion to revive her and save her a trip to the cemetery.

name: Golden Parchment
description:
(Double-click to gain XP.)
Use this scroll to gain XP without putting yourself on the line.

name: Spell Deleveling Potion
description: This potion allows you to delevel the spell of your choice. If you drink it all at once, you might even be able to forget the harsh words of your mother-in-law.

name: Fortified Sufokian Salad
description: The Sufokians quickly spotted that eating seafood stimulated their brains, but not their muscles. That’s why they came up with this recipe.

name: Cawwocola
description: The crafters don't yet know enough about this item for its characteristics to be revealed to potential buyers.

name: Wa Wabbit Drinking Trough
description: This drinking trough is a refreshing spot, a mount's paradise, it can either quench its thirst or have a quick dip if the season is hot. Filled with water and a few drops of magic potion, it will help your special friend grow big and strong.

name: Bworkette Manger
description: This manger is the perfect gift for your trusty mount, if you can find a happy balance between starving and overfeeding it. Take your mount to the manger when it begins to grow weak and it will take care of the rest.

name: Mantiscore Drinking Trough
description: This drinking trough is a refreshing spot, a mount's paradise, it can either quench its thirst or have a quick dip if the season is hot. Filled with water and a few drops of magic potion, it will help your special friend grow big and strong.

name: Kwakwa Lightning Thrower
description: This terrifying wooden machine will launch a little lightning bolt at any creatures that get too close – which is the basis for the third most popular form of entertainment in the region. This machine is also great for increasing your mount's stamina – just tie it to its tail, sit back and enjoy the show!

name: Shin Larva Dragobutt
description: This leather-clad mechanical posterior will excite the coolest of male mounts and would even turn the ever-dignified Crack Beauty into a wild, panting, sweaty mess. It seems to work on Iops as well. *shudder*

name: Great Coralator Slapper
description: This mechanical conception is designed to slap your mount across the face when it disobeys you. It used to be used in schools to teach young Iops to count to 5.

name: Ronin Chafer Lightning Thrower
description: This terrifying wooden machine will launch a little lightning bolt at any creatures that get too close – which is the basis for the third most popular form of entertainment in the region. This machine is also great for increasing your mount's stamina – just tie it to its tail, sit back and enjoy the show!

name: Smiths' Patter
description: This machine will gently soothe a mount by patting it in all the right places, making it less aggressive.

name: Treechorn
description: If you rub this tiny acorn gently, it will begin to swell, and after a short time, if you rub a little more, the Treechnid trapped inside it will come bursting out.
stats: Sub-area: Edge of the Evil Forest or
Sub-area: Edge of the Treechnid Forest or
conditions: Sub-area: Edge of the Evil Forest or
Sub-area: Edge of the Treechnid Forest or

name: Field Potion
description: Ecaflips appreciate that this potion lets them tempt fate with a stroke of luck.

name: Rolled Oat Bread
description: This bread, light and soft in the centre, is ideal for people that Single Mother Nature has endowed with a tiny stomach…

name: Smoked Kittenfish
description: Delicately smoked, this Kittenfish makes a marvellous meal. But be careful, as its smell will stick to your clothes for several decades.

name: Smoked Tigerfish
description: Firmer and more refined than Smoked Kittenfish, this Smoked Tigerfish will delight lovers of fine cuisine.

name: Rusty Box of Fragments
description: This box contains one or several map fragments. If you don't know how to read a map, you can resell them to adventurers who are a bit more clever.

name: Lemon Papillote
description: The tartness of the lemon effectively neutralises the deadly bacteria that have developed in this meat.

name: Bontarian Boon Improvement Potion
description:
This potion no longer has any effect.
(Use it to collect the resources that were previously needed to craft it.)

name: Bivoak Potion
description: This little potion freshens your breath and can, incidentally, take you to a very special place in the Ether.

name: Health Flask
description: This flask restores some Health Points.

name: Walnut Log
description: Unlike your sweetheart, this log is both sweet smelling and sweet tasting. Too bad it won't be more than a single mouthful.

name: Meriana's Potion
description: By drinking this potion, you will be transported to the house of the witch Meriana in the Nauseating Swamps. Take precautions if you are prone to motion sickness, as the mephitic air that will attack your nostrils upon arrival may have unfortunate consequences for your stomach.
stats: Quest 'The Sorceress from the Swamps' complete and
conditions: Quest 'The Sorceress from the Swamps' complete and

name: Gold-Bearing Rolled Oat Bread
description: This bread with an uber-soft centre is just perfect.

name: Rusty Chest
description: Harder to open than to close, but easier to forget than to find.

name: Fortifying Lemon Papillote
description: If this dish doesn’t kill you, it’ll only make you stronger, that’s for certain.

name: Guild House Potion
description: This potion enables you to get back to your guild house.

name: Boostache Patter
description: This machine will gently soothe a mount by patting it in all the right places, making it less aggressive.

name: Golden Scarabugly Dragobutt
description: This leather-clad mechanical posterior will excite the coolest of male mounts and would even turn the ever-dignified Crack Beauty into a wild, panting, sweaty mess. It seems to work on Iops as well. *shudder*

name: Batofu Manger
description: This manger is the perfect gift for your trusty mount, if you can find a happy balance between starving and overfeeding it. Take your mount to the manger when it begins to grow weak and it will take care of the rest.

name: Kickroach Drinking Trough
description: This drinking trough is a refreshing spot, a mount's paradise, it can either quench its thirst or have a quick dip if the season is hot. Filled with water and a few drops of magic potion, it will help your special friend grow big and strong.

name: Fougasse
description: This bread, cooked to golden perfection with a delicate flour contains no colourings or preservatives, unlike the Royal Jelly.

name: Fortifying Meat Roulade
description: The illustrious Ronan the Barbarian rolls these himself under the armpits of his fallen foes.

name: Exotic Crab Stick
description: Made from Exotic Crab Surimi, this meat tastes disgusting, but is very nutritious.

name: Stellia's Chest
description: Stellia might hide her puppets in it. Or her clubs.

name: Rad Dit Potion
description: This potion was invented by an alchemist who wanted to keep the uneducated away from his creations. It had the opposite effect though - it draw the attention of many Astrubians.

name: Meat Roulade
description: This is the favourite meal of Undertakers and Goblin merchants.

name: Crab Stick
description: Enjoy it everywhere, but be careful not to eat too much…

name: Rasputin Cake
description: This cake is delicious, but it can be a bit hard to digest, especially when you add a touch of Scurvion seed.

name: Mumussel and Fries
description: From the depths of the Asse Sea, Mumussels collect kelp and roll it under their armpits. Once the material is shaped like French Fries, they reach the beach to brown them in the sun before eating them.

name: Stagecoach Potion
description: This potion will teleport its drinker to the stagecoach station in Astrub. Fresh mint has been added to mask the smell of dead rat, but the taste remains unchanged. Drink it the moment you wake up - that way, nobody will even notice.

name: Ivory Parchment
description:
(Double-click to gain XP.)
Use this scroll to gain XP without putting yourself on the line.

name: Royal Gobball Slapper
description: This mechanical conception is designed to slap your mount across the face when it disobeys you. It used to be used in schools to teach young Iops to count to 5.

name: Kardorim Slapper
description: This mechanical conception is designed to slap your mount across the face when it disobeys you. It used to be used in schools to teach young Iops to count to 5.

name: Cirsid Hizilinik
description: Tis dilicis-likiknik hizilnik liks nirmik bik riks ifik ivik. Cinik yik risisik tik timptitik ti nibblik ik ip?

name: Cuwsed Cawwot
description: This appetising Cawwot looks pwetty owdinawy but it stinks of evil fwom 50 paces. Will you wesist the temptation to devouw it?

name: Carasau
description: This bread is enriched with whole Barley, which makes for a quality product.

name: Chestnut Log
description: Unlike your sweetheart, this log is both sweet smelling and sweet tasting. Too bad it won't be more than a single mouthful.

name: Astrubian Fritter
description: Ever popular with the kiddies, this fritter is also favoured by adults who hate their food to taste of anything.

name: Fortifying Astrubian Fritter
description: As insipid as its namesake, this fritter is the recommended diet for a Iop.

name: Trout Flambé
description: If prepared following the exotic and ancestral recipe of the Lenalds, this kind of fish will help rekindle the fire in your belly… provided you can master the recipe, which is very rare indeed.

name: Candy Cane
description: By extracting sugar from sweet barley flour, we obtain this unique magic-flavoured sweetie.

name: Insignificant Chest
description: When you knock on the lid, it sounds empty, but maybe, just maybe, there's something interesting in here. A molar? Some hair? A hairy molar? The sky's the limit.

name: Lottery Chest
description:
This chest contains a chest, which contains a chest, which contains a chest, ...
Another piece of tourist tat sold at inflated prices by that cad, Dushan Roll.

name: Ancestral Trout Flambé
description: If prepared following the exotic and ancestral recipe of the Lenalds, this kind of fish will help rekindle the fire in your belly... provided you can master the recipe, which is very rare indeed.

name: Vampire Brain
description: Always overloaded with fresh globules, a vampire brain sucks in all the red blood cells it can. That's why vampires are so pale. As for Iops, it kind of explains their red feet.

name: Alliance Temple Potion
description: With this potion, you can teleport straight to the Alliance Temple. Now you've got no excuse for finding yourself all alone without a role whilst the battle is raging!

name: Superior Mini Healing Potion
description: This mini potion will make you feel a little better than better.

name: Brakmarian Intercity-Express Potion
description: This rice-based potion enables Brakmarians to return to their hometown instantaneously.

name: Bontarian Intercity-Express Potion
description: This rice-based potion enables Bontarians to return to their hometown instantaneously.

name: Gobball-meat Pasty
description: You'll need a strong stomach to swallow this pasty. The gobball meat used in it, not always the freshest cut it has to be said, gives it a flavour akin to oysters in chocolate. Bworks go mad for it.

name: Treasure Hunter Potion
description: The instructions are clear enough... Empty the contents into exactly the right geyser on Frigost Island to create a rainbow whose opposite end may well indicate the location of a hypothetical buried treasure which may or may not have already been found. The potion's secondary use is as a drink which will teleport you to the treasure hunt building.

name: Inisignificant Box of Fragments
description: This box contains one or several map fragments. If you don't know how to read a map, you can resell them to adventurers who are a bit more clever.

name: Divination Potion
description: The Xelor lobby is trying to outlaw the sale of this potion based on a whole bunch of made-up pretexts, simply because it threatens their monopoly. Any resemblance to any or all existing lobbies is purely coincidental.

name: Large Twirling Multicoloured Fairywork
description: This Fairywork will surprise and dazzle even your coolest friends, and is particularly useful for guild celebrations.

name: Ecaflip Elixir
description: A good slug of this and you'll be teleported to the Ecaflip Temple. Known side effects: hiccups, apparition of in-laws, hair loss, dog breath, untied shoelaces, successive red traffic lights.

name: Osamodas Elixir
description: A good slug of this and you'll be teleported to the Osamodas Temple. Known side effects: hiccups, apparition of in-laws, hair loss, dog breath, untied shoelaces, successive red traffic lights.

name: Temple of Scriptures Potion
description: This potion will allow you to teleport to the Temple of Scriptures, otherwise known as the Almanax Sanctuary. Now you have no excuse to not make an offering!

name: Umeshushu

That means they're a lot less creepy than you thought and altogether a poor idea for an Al Howin accessory. But Umeshusu is delicious. Just take a sip and let yourself be carried away on fruit-filled waves of nectar to a land of unsuspected flavour.

description: This boiled sweet appears to be slightly past its best-before-date, or might have been stored in a cupboard next to an open can of Bow Meow food, as it has a rather unusual taste. Eating it might stop you crying, for a few minutes at least.

name: Wayal Cone
description: The upper-part of this ice cream was inspired by the famous Wa hat.

name: Bontarian Ice Cream
description: This ice cream, a subtle mixture of fruity flavours, is the result of the 'know-how of angels'. Well, that's what's written on the box, anyway.

name: Trool Lollipop
description: A really delightful and endless lollipop. To be eaten with your friends, preferably.

name: Minotoball's Balls
description: These incredibly big balls are delicious. You'll think there's no end to them, but isn't that a good thing?

name: Panduff
description: Ideal for libations to the goddess provided you perform the following ritual: lie down on the floor, face the statue, drink a mouthful of Panduff, then drink a big gulp, and finally – and most importantly – take a tiny sip of Panduff. Stare intensely into the eyes of the statue of the goddess. After doing this for a few days straight, she will appear to you. If she doesn't, go and see a shaman.

name: Ripate Beer
description: This beer is so acidic it can hardly be drunk. Indeed, the acidity gives the pint the shelf-life of an overweight Moskito…

name: Chestnut Drinking Trough
description: This drinking trough is a refreshing spot, a mount's paradise, it can either quench its thirst or have a quick dip if the season is hot. Filled with water and a few drops of magic potion, it will help your special friend grow big and strong.

description: Rediscover the charm and flavour of bygone days with this traditionally made strawberry-flavoured candy.

name: Pinchaut Beer
description: This beer is hot which makes it hard to drink in summer. On the other hand, it gives off a pleasant smell of toast, thus making it the ideal beer to drink at breakfast when there's no bread.

name: Small Red Fairywork
description: Ideal for small weddings, and perfect for the annual Captain Chafer Panty Party.

name: Tofu Lollipop
description: This Tofu-flavoured lollipop is a delight for your taste buds, but a cataclysmic nightmare for your breath.

name: Tofu Hot Dog
description: This fatty sausage will give you enough strength to digest all the other sausages you've eaten.

name: Trool Burger
description: This impressive burger could feed an army of starving Chafers. To be eaten in moderation. Abusing Trool is dangerous for your health.

name: Mimilk
description: Warning! As clearly specified on the package you should never give Mimilk to a young Bow Meow - it will ruin the carpets for sure.

name: Pandapils
description: There's an odd old Pandawa custom that demands one toast by wearing a Tofu feather on one's head and singing: "Pandapils, Pandapils, lalalaLAleuh!" And that's by far not the worst…

name: Panduvel
description: Give a Pandawa a fish and he'll eat all day. Teach a Pandawa how to fish and he'll spend his days in a rowing boat drinking Panduvel (old Pandawan saying).

name: Pandarium Tremens
description: "Pandarium Tremens proves Pandawa's love and her will to make us happy." This prayer of thanks addressed to the goddess is a pledge of peace between all Pandawas.

name: Classic Manger
description: This manger is the perfect gift for your trusty mount, if you can find a happy balance between starving and overfeeding it. Take your mount to the manger when it begins to grow weak and it will take care of the rest.

name: Hornbeam Manger
description: This manger is the perfect gift for your trusty mount, if you can find a happy balance between starving and overfeeding it. Take your mount to the manger when it begins to grow weak and it will take care of the rest.

name: Classic Patter
description: This machine will gently soothe a mount by patting it in all the right places, making it less aggressive.

name: Magic Bamboo Drinking Trough
description: This drinking trough is a refreshing spot, a mount's paradise, it can either quench its thirst or have a quick dip if the season is hot. Filled with water and a few drops of magic potion, it will help your special friend grow big and strong.

name: Holy Bambooto Manger
description: This manger is the perfect gift for your trusty mount, if you can find a happy balance between starving and overfeeding it. Take your mount to the manger when it begins to grow weak and it will take care of the rest.

name: Gargoyl Leather Dragobutt
description: This leather-clad mechanical posterior will excite the coolest of male mounts and would even turn the ever-dignified Crack Beauty into a wild, panting, sweaty mess. It seems to work on Iops as well. *shudder*

name: Piglet Leather Dragobutt
description: This leather-clad mechanical posterior will excite the coolest of male mounts and would even turn the ever-dignified Crack Beauty into a wild, panting, sweaty mess. It seems to work on Iops as well. *shudder*

description: This terrifying wooden machine will launch a little lightning bolt at any creatures that get too close – which is the basis for the third most popular form of entertainment in the region. This machine is also great for increasing your mount's stamina – just tie it to its tail, sit back and enjoy the show!

name: Holy Bambooto Lightning Thrower
description: This terrifying wooden machine will launch a little lightning bolt at any creatures that get too close – which is the basis for the third most popular form of entertainment in the region. This machine is also great for increasing your mount's stamina – just tie it to its tail, sit back and enjoy the show!

name: Bwork Beer
description: Bwork Beer will render a Feca drunk from twelve paces. No one knows if it's made of Bworks or by Bworks, but knowing the Bworks, it's probably a bit of both.

name: Piwi Egg
description: Piwi eggs are a real treat for those who have a sweet tooth! However, they hatch very quickly when they're close to a source of heat. That's why you shouldn't leave it in your pocket or in your mouth for too long! A mini Piwi could come out of its shell when you're just about to swallow. And trust me, having a starving Piwi stuck between your teeth or swimming its way through your intestines is not what you need if you're ticklish.

name: Api Fortunawa Cookie
description:
You manage to make out the following words through the bland shell of this Pandawa cookie: "Dofus plantus, nerfus sadidus." This cookie tastes like the fortune writer's tears.
Eating this cookie will increase your Strength in exchange for Vitality during your next fight.
stats: Not in possession of 'Api Fortunawa Cookie Flavour'
conditions: Not in possession of 'Api Fortunawa Cookie Flavour'

name: Strawberry-Lemon Fortunawaduo Cookie
description:
You manage to make out the following words through the bland shell of this Pandawa cookie: "The hero reading this message is a Iop!" Finally, someone who appreciates you the way you deserve.
Eating this cookie will increase your Intelligence and Agility in exchange for Vitality during your next fight.
stats: Not in possession of 'Strawberry-Lemon Fortunawaduo Cookie Flavour'
conditions: Not in possession of 'Strawberry-Lemon Fortunawaduo Cookie Flavour'

name: Api-Strawberry Fortunawaduo Cookie

Eating this cookie will increase your Strength and Intelligence in exchange for Vitality during your next fight.
